attributes.name: Contract
attributes.summary:
## Overview
Create a comprehensive Contract card for legal agreement management in the Boxel framework. This card should handle the entire contract lifecycle from drafting through execution and renewal, with robust tracking, compliance features, and integration with digital signature platforms.

## Core Fields

### Contract Identification
- **contractNumber**: StringField - Unique contract ID (format: CON-YYYY-NNNNN)
- **contractTitle**: StringField - Descriptive contract name
- **contractType**: StringField with enum: "sales", "purchase", "employment", "nda", "service", "lease", "partnership", "license"
- **status**: StringField with enum: "draft", "review", "negotiation", "approved", "executed", "active", "expired", "terminated"
- **version**: NumberField - Contract version number
- **masterAgreement**: linksTo(Contract) - Parent contract if applicable

### Parties Information
- **primaryParty**: linksTo(Organization) - Your organization
- **counterparty**: linksTo(Organization) - Other party
- **additionalParties**: linksToMany(Organization) - Multi-party agreements
- **signatories**: containsMany(Signatory) - Authorized signers
- **legalRepresentatives**: containsMany(LegalRep) - Attorneys/agents
- **witnesses**: containsMany(Witness) - Required witnesses

### Contract Terms
- **effectiveDate**: DateField - Contract start date
- **expirationDate**: DateField - Contract end date
- **term**: contains(ContractTerm) - Duration details
- **autoRenewal**: BooleanField - Automatic renewal clause
- **renewalNotice**: NumberField - Days notice required
- **terminationClauses**: containsMany(TerminationClause) - Exit conditions
- **governingLaw**: StringField - Applicable jurisdiction
- **disputeResolution**: StringField - Arbitration, litigation, etc.

### Financial Terms
- **totalValue**: NumberField - Overall contract value
- **currency**: StringField - Contract currency
- **paymentTerms**: contains(PaymentTerms) - Payment schedule
- **paymentMilestones**: containsMany(PaymentMilestone) - Staged payments
- **penalties**: containsMany(Penalty) - Late payment/breach penalties
- **priceAdjustments**: containsMany(PriceAdjustment) - Escalation clauses
- **retentionAmount**: NumberField - Holdback amount

### Obligations & Deliverables
- **obligations**: containsMany(ContractObligation) - Party responsibilities
- **deliverables**: containsMany(Deliverable) - Required outputs
- **milestones**: containsMany(ContractMilestone) - Key dates
- **performanceMetrics**: containsMany(KPI) - Success criteria
- **serviceLevels**: containsMany(SLA) - Performance standards
- **warranties**: containsMany(Warranty) - Guarantees provided

### Risk & Compliance
- **riskLevel**: StringField - Low, medium, high, critical
- **liabilityLimit**: NumberField - Maximum liability cap
- **insurance**: containsMany(InsuranceRequirement) - Required coverage
- **indemnification**: containsMany(IndemnityClause) - Protection clauses
- **confidentiality**: contains(ConfidentialityTerms) - NDA provisions
- **compliance**: containsMany(ComplianceRequirement) - Regulatory needs
- **auditRights**: contains(AuditProvision) - Inspection rights

### Document Management
- **contractDocument**: contains(FileField) - Main contract file
- **attachments**: containsMany(Attachment) - Exhibits, schedules
- **amendments**: containsMany(Amendment) - Contract changes
- **relatedDocuments**: linksToMany(Document) - SOWs, POs, etc.
- **executedCopy**: contains(FileField) - Signed version
- **language**: StringField - Contract language
- **translations**: containsMany(Translation) - Other languages

### Approval & Execution
- **internalApprovals**: containsMany(Approval) - Required sign-offs
- **negotiationHistory**: containsMany(NegotiationRound) - Changes made
- **redlines**: containsMany(Redline) - Tracked changes
- **signatureStatus**: contains(SignatureTracking) - Execution progress
- **executionDate**: DateField - Fully executed date
- **notarization**: contains(NotaryInfo) - If required

## Required Component Cards

### ContractObligation Card
Create a separate ContractObligation card with:
- **obligationTitle**: StringField - Obligation name
- **responsibleParty**: linksTo(Organization) - Who must perform
- **description**: MarkdownField - Detailed requirements
- **dueDate**: DateField - Completion deadline
- **frequency**: StringField - One-time, monthly, quarterly, etc.
- **status**: StringField - Pending, in-progress, complete, breached
- **evidence**: containsMany(FileField) - Proof of completion
- **consequences**: MarkdownField - Non-compliance impact

### PaymentMilestone Card
- **milestoneName**: StringField - Payment trigger
- **amount**: NumberField - Payment amount
- **dueDate**: DateField - Payment date
- **condition**: MarkdownField - Payment criteria
- **invoiceRequired**: BooleanField - Invoice needed
- **approvalRequired**: BooleanField - Sign-off needed
- **status**: StringField - Pending, invoiced, paid
- **actualPaymentDate**: DateField - When paid

### Amendment Card
- **amendmentNumber**: NumberField - Sequential number
- **effectiveDate**: DateField - When active
- **description**: MarkdownField - What changed
- **sections**: containsMany(StringField) - Modified sections
- **approvals**: containsMany(Approval) - Required sign-offs
- **document**: contains(FileField) - Amendment document
- **executionStatus**: StringField - Draft, executed

## Computed Fields Logic

### Days Until Expiration
Calculate days remaining until contract expiration date.

### Renewal Deadline
Calculate date by which renewal notice must be given based on notice period.

### Total Paid to Date
Sum all completed payment milestones.

### Compliance Score
Percentage of obligations met on time vs. total obligations.

## Card Layout Design

### Isolated/Embedded View Layout
Design a comprehensive contract management interface:

**Header Section**
- Contract title and number
- Status badge with workflow state
- Counterparty name and logo
- Key dates (effective, expiration)
- Quick actions: View, Edit, Renew, Terminate

**Navigation Tabs**
- **Overview**: Summary and key terms
- **Parties**: All involved organizations
- **Terms**: Detailed contract provisions
- **Financials**: Payment schedules and tracking
- **Obligations**: Deliverables and compliance
- **Documents**: Files and amendments
- **Activity**: Timeline and history

**Overview Dashboard**
- **Key Metrics**:
  - Contract value
  - Days to expiration
  - Payment status
  - Compliance score
  - Risk indicator
  
- **Important Dates**:
  - Renewal deadline
  - Upcoming milestones
  - Payment due dates
  - Review dates
  
- **Quick Summary**:
  - Contract type and purpose
  - Main obligations
  - Key contacts
  - Related contracts

**Terms Detail View**
- Structured display of all clauses
- Search within contract
- Clause-level comments
- Version comparison
- Export options

**Obligation Tracker**
- Gantt chart of obligations
- Status indicators
- Responsible party avatars
- Progress tracking
- Evidence attachments

**Financial Overview**
- Payment schedule timeline
- Invoice tracking
- Amount paid vs. remaining
- Currency conversions
- Financial alerts

### Fitted View Layout
- Contract title and type icon
- Counterparty name
- Status and risk indicators
- Value and expiration date
- Progress bars for obligations
- Quick action buttons

### Mobile Contract View
- Essential information display
- Document viewer
- Signature capability
- Notification center
- Offline access

## Interactive Features

### Workflow Management
- Approval routing
- Review assignments
- Negotiation tracking
- Version control
- Audit trail

### Collaboration Tools
- Comment threads on clauses
- Redline tracking
- Change notifications
- Task assignments
- External party portal

### Automation Features
- Renewal reminders
- Obligation alerts
- Payment notifications
- Compliance deadlines
- Escalation triggers

## Styling Requirements
- Professional legal aesthetic
- Clear typography for readability
- Status-based color coding
- Print-optimized layouts
- Accessibility compliance
- Multi-language support
- Mobile responsiveness
- Secure document viewing

## Validation Rules
- Required fields for contract type
- Date logic (start before end)
- Signatory authority validation
- Value and payment alignment
- Obligation date constraints
- Amendment version control
- Duplicate contract detection
- Governing law requirements

## Integration Points
- **E-Signature**: DocuSign, Adobe Sign, HelloSign
- **Document Management**: SharePoint, Box, Google Drive
- **CRM Systems**: Salesforce, Dynamics
- **ERP Systems**: SAP, Oracle, NetSuite
- **Legal Software**: Contract lifecycle management
- **Financial Systems**: AP/AR integration
- **Compliance Tools**: Risk management platforms
- **Calendar**: Outlook, Google Calendar
- **Workflow**: ServiceNow, Power Automate
- **Analytics**: Contract intelligence tools

## Business Logic Requirements
- Multi-level approval workflows
- Automatic obligation tracking
- Renewal processing logic
- Risk scoring algorithms
- Payment milestone triggers
- Compliance monitoring
- Version control system
- Redline comparison
- Template management
- Clause library integration
- AI-powered risk analysis
- Contract value roll-ups
- Notification scheduling
- Archive policies
